name: Vegan One Pot Spaghetti with Vegetables
description: Have you ever tried vegan one pot spaghetti with vegetables? It's so delicious and easy to make! Just perfect for lazy days!
recipeIngredient: 1/2 small zucchini, cut into medium-sized pieces
1/2 small eggplant, cut into medium-sized pieces
1  yellow bell pepper, cut into medium-sized chunks
1 cup cherry tomatoes, cut into halves
1 teaspoon dried Italian herbs (I used thyme,basil, rosemary, and oregano)

recipeInstructions.text: Put all ingredients except for the kale and the broccoli florets into a large pot. Pour in the vegetable broth.
recipeInstructions.name: Put all ingredients except for the kale and the broccoli florets into a large pot. Pour in the vegetable broth.

recipeInstructions.text: Season with dried Italian herbs, salt, and pepper. Cook for about 12-15 minutes or until the pasta is soft.
recipeInstructions.name: Season with dried Italian herbs, salt, and pepper. Cook for about 12-15 minutes or until the pasta is soft.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the kale and the broccoli about 9 minutes into cooking.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the kale and the broccoli about 9 minutes into cooking.
